author: K
title: Motorists urged to exercise caution on the roads to prevent the loss of lives | KenyaMOJA.com
text:
- 4 views
Motorists have been urged to exercise caution on the roads to prevent the loss of lives. speaking during a press briefing at Harambee house in Nairobi, prime cabinet secretary Musalia Mudavadi cautioned Kenyans to prioritize road safety during this festive season, as road-related injuries have risen by 11 per cent. Motorists have also been warned against violating traffic rule
Motorists urged to exercise caution on the roads to prevent the loss of lives
